revisit.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to return to a place you once knew well
revisit.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Ten years later, I revisited the school to find out what had changed.
revisit.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to consider or discuss something again
revisit.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We need to revisit this proposal as soon as the budget is clearer.
